description:
Description :
        Zhang Xiaofan became one of the Top 4 in the tournament, but his heart and mind are shaken. Due to his unrequited love for his Senior Ling'er, his life was put at risk during the tournament. He luckily survived, but the Sect Master has taken notice of the dark aura in the weapon he holds
